entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Antigonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:57 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 11:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to freezing drizzle or flurries near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries changing to flurries and ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
